name: Guardian's Stone
description:
Desire has been grooming herself since she was younger to become a warrior for Aries. Due to her father having a strong opinion against it she has put her passion off until it comes time for saving. Desire notices the land of Aries is starting to change and not for the good. All the vibrant colors that use to surround them is now dull and smog. Her parents are sick as well as the rest of the land due to the Guardian Stone missing.

Desire has to leave Aries and go to ground zero New York in order to retrieve the stone. It is high risk but again this is something she has trained her entire life for. The chance is presented and she feels more than ready to not only bring back the stone but save Aries.
